meta.description: Optimize the number of pipes to transport water to houses, considering wide and narrow pipes with specific constraints.

sets.name: PIPE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of pipes available for water transport.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of pipe in units of water per minute.

vars.name: num_pipes
vars.description: Number of pipes of each type to be used.

objective.name: min_total_pipes
objective.description: Minimize the total number of pipes used.

constraints.name: water_transport_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 900 units of water are transported per minute.

constraints.name: wide_pipes_minimum
constraints.description: At least 5 wide pipes must be used.

constraints.name: wide_to_narrow_ratio
constraints.description: The number of wide pipes can be at most a third of the number of narrow pipes.
